markdownRemark.html:
What art thou, that better and divine part excepted, but as Epictetus said well, a wretched soul, appointed to carry a carcass up and down?

prev.excerpt:
Let it be thy perpetual meditation, how many physicians who
once looked so grim, and so theatrically shrunk their brows upon their patients…
